post.title: CC Foundation
post.content-1: CC Foundation was founded on May 4th 2021 with the primary mission of funding sustainable community development initiatives/programs/projects by either individuals and/or organizations in strict accordance with current rules and regulations.   We work on the principle of non-discrimination, independent and neutral from any political, economic and religious organizations.
post.content-2: CC Foundation is organized and functions on non-profit and voluntary principles and all operating expenses are covered by ourselves. We are accountable to the law for our actions and maintain transparent operating, financial and asset disclosure systems.
